message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its true worth, we're offering it to you for $110. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, taking into account its significance to you personally. We believe this price reflects the value you place on it, while also allowing us to fairly compensate for our efforts and resources. We hope you'll find this offer compelling and look forward to your consideration.
